comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: the part where you say you are doing your part by sharing this telegram channel sounds funny because this type of scheme is very dangerous and the unlucky can lose a lot of money, let's imagine that someone joins your telegram group tomorrow and you announce that you have an altcoin Z that will pump at Y time, so the new guy arrives at Y time and buys the price he thinks is cheap and the altcoin drops a lot because everyone who had already bought early and made a profit sells quickly, that is, there will always be a group that will benefit and another who will lose a lot of money in this type of scheme
